Posts.Content: Had my first FEC-T 8 days ago, I have had the usual drugs and the usual side effects but the worse side effect started 2-3 days ago and it's that I've turned into a patient, placid mum and wife into an angry monster!!!! Constantly angry.( already been through the menopause as had bilateral oopherectomy for pre cancer last year) Do you think this is the steroids still? Anyone else felt the same? Thank you my lovelies Xxxx
Posts.Title: Angry!!!
